fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, give someone a pumpkin. They get powerful defense for the night. They also become roleblock immune for the night. However, any attempt to investigate tonight them turns up suspicious (similar to Mafia Deception Framer), as the pumpkin makes them look scary.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Players do not know they received a pumpkin.
